verses.verse: Now I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4818>chariots<s%> were <S%H3318>coming<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> [were] <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>
Then I <S%H6030>spoke<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with me, <S%H4100>"What<s%> are <S%H428>these,<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%>?"

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H428>"These<s%> are the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>spirits<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4480>after<s%> <S%H3320>standing<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%>

with one of <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> are <S%H3318>going<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country;<s%> and the <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H3836>ones<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>after<s%> <S%H310><s%> them, while the <S%H1261>dappled<s%> <S%H1261>ones<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H8486>south<s%> <S%H776>country.<s%>

"When the <S%H554>strong<s%> <S%H554>ones<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out, they were <S%H1245>eager<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H1980>patrol<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>" And He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> <S%H1980>patrol<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>" So they <S%H1980>patrolled<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Then He <S%H2199>cried<s%> out to me and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7200>"See,<s%> those who are <S%H3318>going<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> have <S%H5117>appeased<s%> My <S%H7307>wrath<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6828>north.<s%>"
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> also <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>"Take<s%> [an offering] from the <S%H1473>exiles,<s%> from <S%H2469>Heldai,<s%> <S%H2900>Tobijah,<s%> and <S%H3048>Jedaiah;<s%> and you <S%H935>go<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6846>Zephaniah,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> they have <S%H935>arrived<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

"And <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> an [ornate] <S%H5850>crown,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> [it] on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

"Then <S%H559>say<s%> to him, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H6780>Branch,<s%> for He will <S%H6779>branch<s%> out from <S%H8478>where<s%> He is; and He will <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"Yes, it is He who will <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and He who will <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H1935>honor<s%> and <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H4910>rule<s%> on His <S%H3678>throne.<s%> Thus, He will be a <S%H3548>priest<s%> on His <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> will be <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> offices."'

"Now the <S%H5850>crown<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2146>reminder<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H2494>Helem,<s%> <S%H2900>Tobijah,<s%> <S%H3048>Jedaiah,<s%> and <S%H2581>Hen<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6846>Zephaniah.<s%>

"And those <S%H7350>who<s%> are <S%H7350>far<s%> off will <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>" Then you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to you. And it will <S%H1961>take<s%> <S%H1961>place,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H8085>completely<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H6963><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
